string.text: Kill Sniper.
Find Sniper.
Find artifact.
Find your first artifact.
Help the wounded stalker.
Find the person who survived after the firing and help him.
Find and bring artifact from gravitational anomaly.
Trader needs any artifact from gravitational anomaly.
Find artifact. You can get it, if you lure someone into the anomaly.
Bring artifact to the merchant.
Help stalker.
Help wounded stalker, who is coming back from the raid.
Hand over the package to the merchant.
Hand over the package to the trader. It may help you.
Steal the case from blockpost.
Steal case with important documents from blockpost commander.
Steal the case from blockpost.
Bring case to the merchant.
Get dynamite for the Wolf.
Collect dynamite from the bandits on the factory and take it to the Wolf.
Find dynamite on the factory.
Bring dynamite to the Wolf.
Meet stalker on the Garbage.
Meet stalker in the garage on the Garbage and get information about Sniper`s clan.
Get military documents from “Agroprom” research institute.
Get military documents from “Agroprom” and deliver them to barman in Stalker bar.
Get military documents from “Agroprom” research institute.
Deliver the documents to barman in Stalker bar.
Meet Sniper's grouping.
You found out, that some stalkers gather on the abandoned factory near “Agroprom” institute. They may lead you to Sniper.
Find the hide of Sniper clan.
Find and search the hide of Sniper clan. There you may get information, where to find Sniper itself.
